General.Name: Aciselsan Acipayam Seluloz Sanayi Ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Aciselsan Acipayam Selüloz Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. purchases, produces, and sells cellulose and cellulose derivatives, and sodium carboxymethyl derivatives in Turkey. The company also engages in the import, export, and trading of various chemicals. Its products are used in detergents, paints, adhesives and thickeners, textiles, foods, oil drilling, ceramics, pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and tiles and electrodes. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is based in Denizli, Turkey.
General.Address: Asagi District Aciselsan Str. No:25, Denizli, Turkey
